com.wizzer.mle.parts.j2d.stages

Interface I2dStage


  • public interface I2dStage
    This interface defines a simple Stage for 2D applications.
    Author:
    Mark S. Millard

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      com.wizzer.mle.runtime.scheduler.MleTask addSet(MleRenderEngine renderer, com.wizzer.mle.runtime.core.MleSet set)
      Registers a new Set with this Stage.
      com.wizzer.mle.runtime.core.MleSize getSize()
      Get the size of the stage.

    • Method Detail

      • addSet

        com.wizzer.mle.runtime.scheduler.MleTask addSet(MleRenderEngine renderer,
                                                com.wizzer.mle.runtime.core.MleSet set)
        Registers a new Set with this Stage.
        Parameters:
        renderer - The rendering thread for the Set being registered.
        set - The Set to register.
        Returns:
        A reference to the scheduled renderer task is returned.

      • getSize

        com.wizzer.mle.runtime.core.MleSize getSize()
        Get the size of the stage.
        Returns:
        The size of the stage's component is returned. Magic Lantern 1.0 supports one component per stage: this is the default component size.
